name: Kill Kyll
description:
Made in one day for Amber Jam 3

Kyll is hanging out in the park. You need to kill him

My main aim was to start learning about how to make npcs

Free assets used:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/lowpoly-environment-nature...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/guns/modern-guns-handgun-129821

https://www.mixamo.com/

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/nature-sound-fx-180413#desc...
